select
from pxbm
U_ID = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
XM like concat('%',#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
XB = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SFZHM like concat('%',#{sfzhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
AGE2 = #{age2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SGZ_BH = #{sgzBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PXZZH = #{pxzzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DWM like concat('%',#{dwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
DWM =#{jqdwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
KMM = #{kmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FS2 = #{fs2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
KQ = #{kq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
JG = #{jg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OP_ZT = #{opZt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
is_cns = #{isCNS,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
is_sb = #{isSB,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
isfp = #{isfp,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
is_apply = #{isApply,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
p_bj = #{p_bj,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
1=1

reply=#{reply,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
